version_description:
Improved support for new iOS versions.
Improved Mi Band 4 support.

Better Mi Band 4 support
Bug fix (font files)

-Better iPad support
-Bug fix

-Amazfit Bip Lite support
-Preliminary Amazfit GTR support
You can now install your favorite watchface on your Amazfit GTR.
The new AmazFit GTR is fully supported.
You can now install custom font on your Amazfit GTR
Bugfix for iOS 13
Fixed timezone issues

Bug fix for iOS 13.
New features are coming soon!
Initial support for Amazfit GTS.
-Support for Amazfit GTS watchfaces
-Support for Amazfit GTS watchfaces

A lot of new features are coming soon!

-Support for Amazfit GTS watchfaces
-Bug fix

Support for Amazfit Verge Lite

Automatic HealthKit export

-Shortcuts support
-New and improved workout page
-You can now export indoor workouts
-Fixed remote camera
-Better performance

-Mi Band 5 Support
-Outlook Calendar Sync
-Improvements to the Install screen (lower CPU usage, faster opening)

-Full Mi Band 5 Support
-New devices will now install files faster

-Full Mi Band 5 Support

-Widgets
-New Spotify authentication flow
-Removed deprecated libraries
-Better support for new devices
-Better privacy controls

-Widgets
-New Spotify authentication flow
-Removed deprecated libraries

-Widgets
-Better support for new devices

-Completely redesigned home page
-Support for all new smartwatches
-Improved synchronization
-Quick Actions
Better support for new devices

- Fixed a rare workout synchronization issue
- Device authentication is improved, with the ability to enter the authentication key manually.
- SpO2 data synchronization with HealthKit
- Improvements to the graphical interface
- Better support for GTS2 / GTR2 / GTS2 mini / Bip U
- Improved error handling when installing watchfaces on new smartwatches
- Better support for newer devices
- Better support for newer devices

This update brings with it the much requested custom triggers on new devices.
Also there are minor graphic changes in some parts of the application.
Other improvements:
- The music player maintains its functionality even while using AmazTools.
- Fixed error 0x03 with some devices (please confirm me if the error is resolved)
- You can set watchface preview from custom image

This update brings with it the much requested custom triggers on new devices.
Also there are minor graphic changes in some parts of the application.
Other improvements:
- The music player maintains its functionality even while using AmazTools.
- Fixed error 0x03 with some devices (please confirm me if the error is resolved)
- You can set watchface preview from custom image
